name: Unus (House of M)
description: Unus is an agent for the House of M royal family.

wiki.relatives: Jared Corbo [[Radius (House of M)|Radius]], son), [[Unuscoine (House of M)|Carmella Unuscoine]], daughter)
wiki.powers: Unus is a mutant with the power to generate an invisible psionic field around himself. This field can deflect and stop objects or projectiles. He can also use this field to move or push people or things. He can mentally control the field and make it as thick or thin as he wishes. He can even open a portion of the field to grab items or hit people. The limits of the field have not yet been determined.
wiki.bio_text: Unus is an agent for the House of M royal family. He was ordered to go to Australia with [[Exodus (House of M)|Exodus]], [[Pyro (House of M)|Pyro]], and [[Vanisher (House of M)|Vanisher]] in order to try and take control of the country. While in Australia Unus was ordered by Exodus to scare a tribe of local natives. Unus followed his orders and when he arrived at the tribes village he was confronted by the [[Hulk (House of M)|Hulk]], who then severely beat him for trying to hurt his people. Unus was then sent to an unnamed hospital where his injuries were treated.
